article.title: My $99 Apple Smart Home
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: With a growing smart home tech market, many of us want to get involved, but are put off by the high price tags. But, what if you automate your home for less than $100?

authors.bio: Hey, I'm Tom. I'm exploring software and hardware and documenting the process!
